name: PHCollectionList
desc: A group containing Photos asset collections, such as Moments, Years, or folders of user-created albums.

items.name: class func fetchCollectionListsContaining(PHCollection, options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHCollectionList>
items.desc: Retrieves collection lists that contain the specified collection.

items.name: class func fetchCollectionLists(withLocalIdentifiers: [String], options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHCollectionList>
items.desc: Retrieves collection lists with the specified local-device-specific unique identifiers.

items.name: class func fetchCollectionLists(with: PHCollectionListType, subtype: PHCollectionListSubtype, options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHCollectionList>
items.desc: Retrieves collection lists of the specified type.

items.name: class func fetchMomentLists(with: PHCollectionListSubtype, containingMoment: PHAssetCollection, options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHCollectionList>
items.desc: Retrieves collection lists of the specified moment list type containing the specified moment.

items.name: class func fetchMomentLists(with: PHCollectionListSubtype, options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHCollectionList>
items.desc: Retrieves collection lists of the specified moment list type.

items.name: var collectionListType: PHCollectionListType
items.desc: The type of asset collection group that the collection list represents.

items.name: enum PHCollectionListType
items.desc: Major distinctions between kinds of collection list, used by the collectionListType property and fetchCollectionLists(with:subtype:options:) method.

items.name: var collectionListSubtype: PHCollectionListSubtype
items.desc: The type of asset collection grouping the collection list represents.

items.name: enum PHCollectionListSubtype
items.desc: Major distinctions between kinds of collection list, used by the collectionListSubtype property and fetchCollectionLists(with:subtype:options:), fetchMomentLists(with:containingMoment:options:), and fetchMomentLists(with:options:) methods.

items.name: var startDate: Date?
items.desc: The earliest creation date among all assets in the collection list.

items.name: var endDate: Date?
items.desc: The latest creation date among all assets in the collection list.

items.name: var localizedLocationNames: [String]
items.desc: The names of locations grouped by the collection (an array of NSString objects).

items.name: class func transientCollectionList(with: [PHCollection], title: String?) -> PHCollectionList
items.desc: Creates a temporary collection list that contains the specified asset collections.

items.name: class func transientCollectionList(withCollectionsFetchResult: PHFetchResult<PHCollection>, title: String?) -> PHCollectionList
items.desc: Creates a temporary collection list containing the asset collections in the specified fetch result.
